usefulItems: pie pan (approx. 9 in.), pastry brush, large bowl, refrigerator, oven, freezer
title: Crème Fraîche Apple Pie

preparations.content: Line a pie pan with one pie crust dough. Roll out the second pie dough to ¼ inch thick. Cut rolled dough into strips (½ in.-1 in.). Refrigerate pie crust and dough strips for 15 minutes. Meanwhile prepare apples.
Core, peel and slice apples (¼ in.). Place a large bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in 32 oz apple slices. Add lemon juice, toss to coat and set aside.
Place crème fraîche, 1 egg, sugar, brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, ginger, salt and vanilla into mixing bowl and mix <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>.

Place reserved sliced apples into chilled pie dough, piled high in the middle. Pour crème fraîche mixture evenly over apples. Create a lattice crust on top of apples with prepared dough strips and chill in freezer for 15 minutes.
Preheat oven to 425°F. Place 1 egg into a bowl and lightly whisk with a fork.

Brush top of pie with whisked egg, sprinkle with turbinado sugar and bake for 25 minutes (425°F). Reduce oven temperature to 375°F and bake 30-40 minutes (375°F), until golden brown. Let cool completely before serving.
